statements: SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York'
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_date FROM flights WHERE arrival_city = 'London'
SELECT * FROM flights ORDER BY departure_date DESC
SELECT airline_name, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE flight_id = 100
SELECT flight_id, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE airline_name='Delta Airlines';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city='New York' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_city='Los Angeles' AND arrival_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM flights WHERE arrival_city='London';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_date FROM flights WHERE arrival_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_date, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, seat_number FROM bookings WHERE flight_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_date FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'Chicago' ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT airline, COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM flights GROUP BY airline HAVING total_flights > 2;
SELECT b.booking_id, b.booking_date, f.airline, f.departure_city, f.arrival_city FROM bookings b JOIN flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE b.user_id = 123 ORDER BY b.booking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY departure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE payment_status = 'paid';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT airline_name, departure_location, arrival_location FROM flights WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE arrival_location = 'New York';
SELECT flight_number, airline_name, departure_date FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta Airlines';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%12345%';
SELECT booking_id, user_id, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 500.00 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT flight_number, arrival_location, departure_location FROM flights WHERE departure_date >= '2022-08-15' AND departure_date <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city, departure_time FROM flights WHERE arrival_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city FROM flights WHERE departure_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, departure_city, arrival_city, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;

SELECT p.name, p.email, f.airline_name, f.departure_city, f.arrival_city FROM passengers p INNER JOIN bookings b ON p.passenger_id = b.passenger_id INNER JOIN flights f ON b.flight_id = f.flight_id WHERE f.departure_time < '2023-12-31';

SELECT d.city, d.country, f.airline_name, f.departure_city, f.arrival_city, b.total_amount FROM destinations d INNER JOIN flights f ON d.airport_code = f.departure_city INNER JOIN bookings b ON f.flight_id = b.flight_id WHERE b.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY b.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, origin, destination FROM flights WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights WHERE origin = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE origin='New York';
SELECT flight_number, destination, departure_date FROM flights WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT destination_id, city, country, airport_code FROM destinations WHERE airport_code='JFK';
SELECT user_id, booking_date, status FROM bookings WHERE status='confirmed' AND booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
